meanings.definition: A board game for two to four players, in which pieces are moved according to the throw of dice.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we all gathered around to play parchesis.
meanings.sent2: Let's set up the parchesis board and start rolling the dice.
meanings.sent3: The intense rivalry in parchesis always leads to laughter and fun.
meanings.sent4: Playing parchesis is like navigating through a maze of luck and strategy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful parchesis board instantly grabs your attention and draws you into the game.

meanings.definition: The act of playing the board game parcheesi.
meanings.sent1: Her enthusiasm for parchesis is contagious, making everyone want to join in.
meanings.sent2: After dinner, we decided to have a quick round of parchesis before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The family's tradition of parchesis tournaments always brings out the competitive spirit.
meanings.sent4: In the world of board games, parchesis stands out as a classic favorite.
meanings.sent5: The sound of dice rolling is synonymous with the excitement of parchesis.
